credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Forsythe Sherfesee
title: "Club chair"
provenance: A photograph of Jean-Michel Frank's apartment shows the chairs in his sitting room and office, located at Rue de Verneuil, Paris. The "club" chair was a frequent part of his residential interior design schemes.
description:
This set of armchairs [3] is characterized by its square shape and matching tan leather.  The armchair's base, very bulky, rests on four wooden feet.  The seat cushion is padded.

The original manufacture is unknown. The chair is manufactured today in leather or colored fabric by 1) Gordon International 2) IFEX, Modern Classics, Italy.
name: Armchair
